summary: This document is a bank statement from Fifth Third Bank for Shocker Holdings LLC for the period of March 1, 2017, to March 31, 2017. It details the account balance, transactions, and service charges associated with the account, highlighting a withdrawal to the North Carolina Secretary of State.

persons.name: Phili Fintchrc
persons.context: Phili Fintchrc is identified as the Relationship Manager for the account at Fifth Third Bank.

keyFacts: The account belongs to Shocker Holdings LLC, located at 27 High Tech Blvd, Thomasville, NC.
The statement shows a beginning balance of $9,322.45 and an ending balance of $9,120.45.
A withdrawal of $202.00 was made to the North Carolina Secretary of State.
The standard monthly service charge was waived due to meeting balance criteria.
The document includes promotional information for business check products from Harland Clarke.
